properties.name: database.url
properties.description: URL of the database the service will connect to.

properties.name: schema.password
properties.description: The password for the database schema the service will connect to.

properties.name: energy-portal.api.url
properties.description: The URL to the Energy Portal API (ending in `/graphql`).

properties.name: energy-portal.api.token
properties.description: The pre-shared key to authenticate with the Energy Portal API.

properties.name: energy-portal.registration-url
properties.description: The user registration url of the Energy Portal.

properties.name: energy-portal.access-api.base-url
properties.description: The Energy Portal team access API base url. (ending in the fox 5 context for the environment).

properties.name: energy-portal.access-api.token
properties.description: The Energy Portal team access API token.
